titles.title: My Times Of Sorrow And Of Joy (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My times of sorrow and of joy Great God are in Thy hand My choicest comforts come from Thee And go at Thy command{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If Thou shouldst take them all away Yet would I not repine Before they were possesed by me They were entirely Thine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nor would I drop a murmuring word Though the whole world were gone But seek enduring happiness In Thee and Thee alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What is the world with all its store 'Tis but a bitter sweet When I attempt to pluck the rose A pricking thorn I meet{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here perfect bliss can ne'er be found The honey's mixed with gall Midst changing scenes and dying friends Be Thou my all in all{/lang-eng}
